data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Diffa.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Diffa, Niger
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, convict the 4,739 believers in Diffa to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Lord, to the people of Diffa you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 489,500 souls in Diffa and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
There are 489,500 people living in the state of Diffa. Only about 4,739 might be believers.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Diffa, Niger a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Diffa, Niger today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
